section.p:
This clinical statement represents Advance Directive Observation findings (e.g., "resuscitation status is Full Code") rather than orders. It should not be considered a legal document or a substitute for the actual Advance Directive document. The related legal documents are referenced using the reference/externalReference element.
The Advance Directive Observation describes the patient's directives, including but not limited to:
Medications
Transfer of Care to Hospital
Treatment
Procedures
Intubation and Ventilation
Diagnostic Tests
Tests
The observation/value element contains the detailed patient directive which may be coded or text. For example, a category directive may be antibiotics, and the details would be intravenous antibiotics only.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-8655, CONF:1198-10485, CONF:1198-32496 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Advance Directive Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet AdvanceDirectiveTypeCode 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.2 STATIC 2006-10-17 (CONF:1198-8651)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1198-8656)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:1198-30804)
If type CD, then value will be SNOMED-CT (CONF:1098-32493).

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:1198-8662)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="VRF" (CONF:8663, R2.1=CONF:1198-8663)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] time (CONF:1198-8665, CONF:1198-8666)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole such that it (CONF:1198-8825)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy (HIPAA) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-28446)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] addr (CONF:1198-28451)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] playingEntity such that it (CONF:1198-28428)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Agent Qualifier Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.51 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-28429)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] name (CONF:1198-28454)
The playingEntity/name SHALL be a conformant US Realm Person Name (PN.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.1.1) (CONF:28455).

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:1198-8667)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="CST" (CONF:8668, R2.1=CONF:1198-8668)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole such that it (CONF:1198-8669)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="AGNT" (CONF:8670, R2.1=CONF:1198-8670)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Personal And Legal Relationship Role Type 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.12.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-28440)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] addr (CONF:1198-8671)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] telecom (CONF:1198-8672)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingEntity such that it (CONF:1198-8824)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Agent Qualifier Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.51 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-28444)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:1198-8673)
Record the name of the agent who can provide a copy of the Advance Directive in the name element.

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] reference such that it (CONF:1198-8692)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode/@code="REFR" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) (CONF:8694, R2.1=CONF:1198-8694)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] externalDocument such that it (CONF:8693, R2.1=CONF:1198-8693)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8695, R2.1=CONF:1198-8695)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:8696, R2.1=CONF:1198-8696)
The text, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @mediaType (CONF:8703)
The text, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] reference. a. The URL of a referenced advance directive document MAY be present, and SHALL be represented in Observation/reference/ExternalDocument/text/reference. b. If a URL is referenced, then it SHOULD have a corresponding linkHTML element in narrative block. (CONF:8697, R2.1=CONF:1198-8697, CONF:8698, R2.1=CONF:1198-8698, CONF:8699, R2.1=CONF:1198-8699)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1198-32406)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire.
If the Advance Directive does not have a specified ending time, the <high> element SHALL have the nullFlavor attribute set to NA (CONF:1198-32449)
SHALL conform to Advance Directive Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8648, R2.1=CONF:1198-8648)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8649, R2.1=CONF:1198-8649)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8654, R2.1=CONF:1198-8654)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet AdvanceDirectiveTypeCode 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.2 STATIC 2006-10-17 (CONF:1198-8651)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:8652, R2.1=CONF:1198-8652, R2.1=CONF:1198-19082)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1198-8656)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:1198-30804)
If type CD, then value will be SNOMED-CT (CONF:1098-32493).

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] reference such that it (CONF:8692)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode/@code="REFR" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) (CONF:8694, R2.1=CONF:1198-8694)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] externalDocument such that it (CONF:8693, R2.1=CONF:1198-8693)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8695, R2.1=CONF:1198-8695)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:8696, R2.1=CONF:1198-8696)
The text, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @mediaType (CONF:8703)
The text, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] reference. a. The URL of a referenced advance directive document MAY be present, and SHALL be represented in Observation/reference/ExternalDocument/text/reference. b. If a URL is referenced, then it SHOULD have a corresponding linkHTML element in narrative block. (CONF:8697, R2.1=CONF:1198-8697, CONF:8698, R2.1=CONF:1198-8698, CONF:8699, R2.1=CONF:1198-8699)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:1198-8662)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="VRF" (CONF:8663, R2.1=CONF:1198-8663)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] time (CONF:1198-8665, CONF:1198-8666)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole such that it (CONF:1198-8825)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy (HIPAA) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-28446)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] addr (CONF:1198-28451)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] playingEntity such that it (CONF:1198-28428)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Agent Qualifier Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.51 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-28429)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] name (CONF:1198-28454)
The playingEntity/name SHALL be a conformant US Realm Person Name (PN.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.1.1) (CONF:28455).

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:1198-8667)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="CST" (CONF:8668, R2.1=CONF:1198-8668)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole such that it (CONF:1198-8669)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="AGNT" (CONF:8670, R2.1=CONF:1198-8670)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Personal And Legal Relationship Role Type 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.12.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-28440)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] addr (CONF:1198-8671)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] telecom (CONF:1198-8672)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingEntity such that it (CONF:1198-8824)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Agent Qualifier Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.51 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-28444)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:1198-8673)
Record the name of the agent who can provide a copy of the Advance Directive in the name element.

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] reference such that it (CONF:1198-8692)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode/@code="REFR" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) (CONF:8694, R2.1=CONF:1198-8694)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] externalDocument such that it (CONF:8693, R2.1=CONF:1198-8693)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8695, R2.1=CONF:1198-8695)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:8696, R2.1=CONF:1198-8696)
The text, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @mediaType (CONF:8703)
The text, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] reference. a. The URL of a referenced advance directive document MAY be present, and SHALL be represented in Observation/reference/ExternalDocument/text/reference. b. If a URL is referenced, then it SHOULD have a corresponding linkHTML element in narrative block. (CONF:8697, R2.1=CONF:1198-8697, CONF:8698, R2.1=CONF:1198-8698, CONF:8699, R2.1=CONF:1198-8699)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1198-32406)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)
This effectiveTime SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low i. If the starting time is unknown, the <low> element SHALL have the nullFlavor attribute set to UNK (CONF:8657, CONF:8658)

This effectiveTime SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] high. i. If the ending time is unknown, the <high> element SHALL have the nullFlavor attribute set to UNK. ii. If the Advance Directive does not have a specified ending time, the <high> element SHALL have the nullFlavor attribute set to NA. (CONF:8659, CONF:8660)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire.
If the Advance Directive does not have a specified ending time, the <high> element SHALL have the nullFlavor attribute set to NA (CONF:1198-32449)

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="2053712567"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> <time/> <assignedAuthor> <id root="MDHT" extension="605781702"/> <code code="910903437"/> <assignedPerson/> <representedOrganization/> </assignedAuthor> </author> <participant> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.58"/> <time> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </time> <participantRole> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.101" codeSystemName="NUCC Health Care Provider Taxonomy"/> <playingEntity> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> </playingEntity> </participantRole> </participant> <participant> <participantRole> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.111" codeSystemName="RoleCode"/> <telecom/> <playingEntity> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> </playingEntity> </participantRole> </participant> <reference typeCode="REFR"> <externalDocument> <id root="MDHT" extension="1640672768"/> <text>Text Value</text> </externalDocument> </reference> </observation>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:8655, CONF:10485 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48"

Consol Advance Directive Observation This effectiveTime SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low i. If the starting time is unknown, the element SHALL have the nullFlavor attribute set to UNK (CONF:8657, CONF:8658)

Consol Advance Directive Observation This effectiveTime SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] high. i. If the ending time is unknown, the element SHALL have the nullFlavor attribute set to UNK. ii. If the Advance Directive does not have a specified ending time, the element SHALL have the nullFlavor attribute set to NA. (CONF:8659, CONF:8660)
SHALL conform to CDA Observation
Consol Advance Directive Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8648, R2.1=CONF:1198-8648)
Consol Advance Directive Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8649, R2.1=CONF:1198-8649)
Consol Advance Directive Observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8654, R2.1=CONF:1198-8654)
Consol Advance Directive Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Advance Directive Type Code 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.2 DYNAMIC (CONF:8651)

Consol Advance Directive Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:8652, R2.1=CONF:1198-8652, R2.1=CONF:1198-19082)
Consol Advance Directive Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:8656)
Consol Advance Directive Observation SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] participant, where its type is Verifier (CONF:8662)
Consol Advance Directive Observation SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] participant, where its type is Custodian (CONF:8667)
Consol Advance Directive Observation SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] reference, where its type is Reference (CONF:8692)
SHALL conform to CDA Reference
Consol Reference SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode/@code="REFR" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) (CONF:8694, R2.1=CONF:1198-8694)
Consol Reference SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] externalDocument, where its type is External Document (CONF:8693, R2.1=CONF:1198-8693)
Consol External Document The text, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @mediaType (CONF:8703)

Consol External Document The text, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] reference. a. The URL of a referenced advance directive document MAY be present, and SHALL be represented in Observation/reference/ExternalDocument/text/reference. b. If a URL is referenced, then it SHOULD have a corresponding linkHTML element in narrative block. (CONF:8697, R2.1=CONF:1198-8697, CONF:8698, R2.1=CONF:1198-8698, CONF:8699, R2.1=CONF:1198-8699)
SHALL conform to CDA External Document
Consol External Document SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8695, R2.1=CONF:1198-8695)
Consol External Document MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:8696, R2.1=CONF:1198-8696)
SHALL conform to CDA Participant2
Consol Custodian SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="CST" (CONF:8668, R2.1=CONF:1198-8668)
Consol Custodian SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole, where its type is Custodian Role (CONF:8669)
Consol Custodian Role SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] addr (CONF:8671)
Consol Custodian Role SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="AGNT" (CONF:8670, R2.1=CONF:1198-8670)
Consol Custodian Role SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] telecom (CONF:8672)
Consol Custodian Role SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingEntity, where its type is Custodian Entity (CONF:8824)
Consol Custodian Entity The name of the agent who can provide a copy of the Advance Directive SHALL be recorded in the element inside the element (CONF:8674)
Consol Custodian Entity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:8673)
SHALL conform to CDA Participant2
Consol Verifier SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] time (CONF:8665)
Consol Verifier SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="VRF" (CONF:8663, R2.1=CONF:1198-8663)
Consol Verifier SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole, where its type is CDA Participant Role (CONF:8825)
